issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Release
components.description: This component is used for issues related to releasing the product. Release notes, copying builds to the server, etc.

fields.description:
The BOM Check did no pass.

The following files were only found in SDK team's BOM:

< mobilesdk/osx/2.1.1/iphone/iphone/Titanium.xcodeproj/project.xcworkspace/contents.xcworkspacedata
< mobilesdk/osx/2.1.1/iphone/iphone/Titanium.xcodeproj/project.xcworkspace/xcuserdata/bill.xcuserdatad/UserInterfaceState.xcuserstate
< mobilesdk/osx/2.1.1/iphone/iphone/Titanium.xcodeproj/xcuserdata/bill.xcuserdatad/xcschemes/Titanium-KitchenSink-iPad.xcscheme
< mobilesdk/osx/2.1.1/iphone/iphone/Titanium.xcodeproj/xcuserdata/bill.xcuserdatad/xcschemes/Titanium-KitchenSink-universal.xcscheme
< mobilesdk/osx/2.1.1/iphone/iphone/Titanium.xcodeproj/xcuserdata/bill.xcuserdatad/xcschemes/Titanium-KitchenSink.xcscheme
< mobilesdk/osx/2.1.1/iphone/iphone/Titanium.xcodeproj/xcuserdata/bill.xcuserdatad/xcschemes/xcschememanagement.plist

comments.body: per Sabil, these files are not required in deliverable. Therefore, no need to update release.
Correct. These are files that have no affect on the build (breakpoints, window position, etc) and should NOT be part of the released package.
Closing ticket due to time passed.
